definitions.definition: An astrology -based, middle-platonic mystery religion of the 1st-4th century Roman Empire that claimed to have been founded by Zoroaster , admitted only men, and was especially popular among the Roman military.

main_definition: An astrology -based, middle-platonic mystery religion of the 1st-4th century Roman Empire that claimed to have been founded by Zoroaster , admitted only men, and was especially popular among the Roman military.
